languages.text: [Хлопнуть по плечу] "А ты молодец, Малгар. И ребята твои молодцы. На таких, как вы, и держится Империум!"

traits.locale_text: [Хлопнуть по плечу] "А ты молодец, Малгар. И ребята твои молодцы. На таких, как вы, и держится Империум!"

languages.text: [Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"
languages.original_text: [Хлопнуть по плечу] "А ты молодец, Малгар. И ребята твои молодцы. На таких, как вы, и держится Империум!"

traits.locale_text: [Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing good work, Malgar. And so are your troops. People like you are what is holding the Imperium together!"
[Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing good work, Malgar. And so are your troops. People like you are what is holding the Imperium together!"
[Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing great work, Malgar. And so are your troops. People like you are what is holding the Imperium together!"
[Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing great work, Malgar. And so are your troops. People like you are what is holding the Imperium together!"
[Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"
[Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"

languages.text: [Ihm auf die Schulter klopfen] "Ihr leistet erstklassige Arbeit, Malgar. Und Eure Truppen ebenfalls. Leute wie Ihr halten das Imperium zusammen!"
languages.original_text: [Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"

traits.locale_text: [Ihm auf die Schulter klopfen] "Ihr leistet erstklassige Arbeit, Malgar. Und Eure Truppen ebenfalls. Leute wie Ihr halten das Imperium zusammen!"

languages.text: [Lui donner une tape sur l'épaule] « Vous faites du bon travail, Malgar, et vos gars aussi. Ce sont des gens comme vous qui assurent la cohésion de l'Imperium ! »
languages.original_text: [Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"

traits.locale_text: [Lui donner une tape sur l'épaule] « Vous faites du bon travail, Malgar, et vos gars aussi. Ce sont des gens comme vous qui font que l'Imperium tient bon ! »

languages.text: [拍拍他的肩膀]“干得漂亮，马尔加，你的军队也很了不起。像你们这样的人，正是帝国的支柱！”
languages.original_text: [Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"

traits.locale_text: [拍拍他的肩膀]“你做得很好，马尔加，你的军队也很了不起。像你们这样的人，正是帝国的支柱！”

languages.text: [肩をたたく]「お前はいい仕事をしている、マルガー。お前の部隊もだ。諸君らのような人々が帝国を支えているんだ！」
languages.original_text: [Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"

traits.locale_text: [肩をたたく]「君は素晴らしい仕事をしているよ、マルガー。君の部隊もだ。君のような人たちが帝国を支えているんだ！」

languages.text: [Darle una palmada en el hombro] «Está haciendo un gran trabajo, Malgar. Y sus tropas también. ¡La gente como usted es lo que mantiene unido al Imperium!».
languages.original_text: [Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"

traits.locale_text: [Darle una palmada en el hombro] «Está haciendo un gran trabajo, Malgar. Y sus tropas también. Gente como usted es lo que mantiene unido al Imperium».

languages.text: [Sırtını sıvazla] "Sen de askerlerin de iyi iş çıkarıyorsunuz Malgar. İmparatorluk sizin gibi yiğitler sayesinde bir arada, ayakta!"
languages.original_text: [Pat him on the shoulder] "You are doing fine work, Malgar. And so are your troops. It is people like you that hold the Imperium together!"

traits.locale_text: [Sırtını sıvazla] "Sen de askerlerin de iyi iş çıkarıyorsunuz Malgar. İmparatorluk sizin gibi yiğitler sayesinde bir arada, ayakta!"
